Package me.itzloghotxd.pdk.gui

Class AbstractInventory

java.lang.Object
me.itzloghotxd.pdk.gui.AbstractInventory
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.inventory.InventoryHolder
public abstract class AbstractInventory extends Object implements org.bukkit.inventory.InventoryHolder
Represents an abstract inventory that provides a base structure for custom GUI implementations. This class implements InventoryHolder and allows for handling inventory interactions.

It provides methods for setting up an inventory, handling item placement, and responding to inventory click and close events.

Author:
ItzLoghotXD
